auth.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters and include a letter and a number.

auth.trialTierHint: Enterprise trials are shorter by default.
auth.signupTokenMissing: Signup completed, but verification token missing.

home.title: New Vision Inventory
home.subtitle: Inventory, sales, and stock control built for real-world operations.

onboardingPage.title: Getting started
onboardingPage.subtitle: Complete the required setup steps to start using the system.

onboardingPage.branchHint: Confirm your default branch or add more branches.
onboardingPage.teamHint: Invite teammates and assign roles now, or come back later.

appShell.syncHint: Sync when online to avoid conflicts.

notificationsPage.title: Notifications
notificationsPage.markAllReadConfirm: Mark all visible notifications as read?
notificationsPage.archiveConfirm: Archive selected notifications? This removes them from the inbox.

notificationsEvents.lowStockHint: Alert when variants drop below thresholds.
notificationsEvents.offlineNearingLimitHint: Alert when offline usage approaches limits.
notificationsEvents.creditOverdueHint: Alert when customer credit is overdue.
notificationsEvents.graceWarningsHint: Alert when subscriptions enter grace windows.
notificationsEvents.expiryHint: Alert when batches are near expiry dates.
notificationsEvents.noteReminderHint: Alert when note reminders are due.
notificationsEvents.saleDraftedHint: Alert when sales are saved as drafts.
notificationsEvents.saleVoidedHint: Alert when draft sales are voided.
notificationsEvents.transferCreatedHint: Alert when inventory transfers are created.
notificationsEvents.transferInTransitHint: Alert when transfers move to in-transit.
notificationsEvents.stockAdjustedHint: Alert when stock adjustments are recorded.
notificationsEvents.stockCountRecordedHint: Alert when stock counts are recorded.
notificationsEvents.purchaseOrderCreatedHint: Alert when purchase orders are created.
notificationsEvents.purchaseOrderApprovedHint: Alert when purchase orders are approved.
notificationsEvents.receivingRecordedHint: Alert when stock receiving is recorded.
notificationsEvents.supplierReturnRecordedHint: Alert when supplier returns are recorded.
notificationsEvents.subscriptionRequestApprovedHint: Alert when subscription requests are approved.
notificationsEvents.subscriptionRequestRejectedHint: Alert when subscription requests are rejected.
notificationsEvents.securityRefreshTokenReuseHint: Alert when a refresh token is reused.
notificationsEvents.securityUnusualLoginHint: Alert when a login looks unusual.

exportsPage.noCsvFound: No CSV found for this job.

offlinePage.riskWarning: Risk warning: Sync as soon as you reconnect to avoid conflicts.

offlineConflictsPage.title: Offline conflicts
offlineConflictsPage.subtitle: Review conflicts from offline sync and resolve them.

businessSettingsPage.title: Business settings

businessSettingsPage.subscriptionRequestsUnavailable: Subscription requests unavailable for this account.

businessSettingsPage.unitsSubtitle: Add custom units for this business. Global units remain available.
businessSettingsPage.defaultsSubtitle: Edit requires explicit save to apply.
businessSettingsPage.readOnlyHint: Settings are read-only until you enter edit mode.
businessSettingsPage.notificationChannelsHint: Channels apply across all events. In-app alerts are always on.
businessSettingsPage.notificationRecipientsHint: Choose who can receive notifications across all events.
businessSettingsPage.notificationWhatsappEnterprise: WhatsApp recipients are available on Enterprise tiers.
businessSettingsPage.notificationEventsHint: Choose which events fire, which channels they use, and who receives them.

notificationGroupHint.system: System limits, reminders, and grace warnings.

businessSettingsPage.localizationHint: Currency and timezone drive receipts, reports, and POS displays.
businessSettingsPage.stockPoliciesHint: FEFO and expiry policies apply only when batch tracking is enabled.
businessSettingsPage.refundReturnStock: Refunds return to stock by default

businessSettingsPage.deleteValidationFailed: Confirm business ID, password, and DELETE text.

branchesPage.title: Branches
branchesPage.subtitle: Manage branch locations and contact details.

rolesPage.permissionPresetFullHint: Full access: sensitive or irreversible actions.

settingsRead.title: System settings
settingsRead.description: Allows viewing system-wide settings and configuration.

settingsWrite.title: Update settings
settingsWrite.description: Allows changing system-wide settings and configuration.

subscriptionRead.title: Subscription status
subscriptionRead.description: Allows viewing plan, billing, and subscription status.

subscriptionRequest.description: Allows requesting plan changes or trial extensions.

usersRead.description: Allows viewing user list and profiles.

rolesRead.title: View roles

rolesUpdate.title: Edit roles
rolesUpdate.description: Allows updating roles and their permissions.

priceListsManage.description: Allows creating, updating, and assigning price lists.

stockWrite.description: Allows creating stock adjustments and moving stock.

transfersRead.description: Allows viewing stock transfers between branches.

salesCreditCreate.title: Create sales credit

salesCreditSettle.title: Settle sales credit
salesCreditSettle.description: Allows settling credit balances or marking as paid.

salesReturnWithoutReceipt.title: Return without receipt
salesReturnWithoutReceipt.description: Allows processing returns without a receipt.

customersRead.title: View customers
customersRead.description: Allows viewing customer list and profiles.

customersSensitiveRead.title: View sensitive data
customersSensitiveRead.description: Allows viewing sensitive customer data (contacts, IDs).

purchasesRead.title: View purchases

purchasesWrite.title: Manage purchases

exportsWrite.title: Export reports

approvalsRead.title: View approvals
approvalsRead.description: Allows viewing approval requests and status.

offlineRead.title: View offline status
offlineRead.description: Allows viewing offline queue and sync status.

offlineWrite.title: Manage offline sync
offlineWrite.description: Allows forcing sync or clearing offline queue.

notesManage.title: Manage notes
notesManage.description: Allows deleting or managing all notes.
